missions.Paw and Fur: Member: You are member of the Paw and Fur hunting elite. You currently have 1 Paw and Fur points.
missions.Paw and Fur: The Snapper: Grizzly told you about the Snapper, a crocodile that already killed many citizens of Port Hope. Try find its hideout and kill it.

missions.The Way to Yalahar: Wyrdin has asked you to go to Yalahar City to pick up some documents from the local Explorer Society representative.

missions.Joining the Explorers (completed): Bring the pickaxe back to the Explorer Society representative.

missions.Hidden Threats: You have met Corym Servant. He told you the true story of enslaved corym working under terrible conditions. You have agreed to help him planing a riot. First you have to liberate his comrades.

missions.Zathroth Remmants:
A remnant cult of Zathroth has formed in a forbidden temple beneath Carlin. Find out what's behind this and stop it in time.
